short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test chrome enterprise hardwarePlatform api as it has to be published for admins to make it pre-installed by policy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension that will make greetings to you!
It will welcome you by showing "Hello there!" and let you know if you are in a virtual desktop environment when you click it.
